title: Welcome to IRRPP
text: This report is the culmination of a year-long study by IRRPP comissioned by CPS and CTU examining how school personnel created a climate of trust and the effect of strong administrator and teacher relationships for instructional performance and teacher evaluations. Find out more and download this report here.

We greatly appreciate CAN TV coverage of the launch of IRRPP's latest report, Between the Great Migration and the Growing Exodus: The Future of Black Chicago? For those of you who could not make the event or who would like to hear the brilliant panelists again, you can find a link to the CAN TV video of the event here.

The February Scholar Spotlight features the work of Mansha Mirza, Associate Professor in Occupational Therapy & Disability and Human Development, and features her research to improve language access in health and social services for individuals with limited English proficiency. You can find that spotlight here.
Email us if you have an event that you would like to see publicized in our weekly bulletin.
